name: Build Factory
concept: Investing in manufacturing boosts long run productive capacity.

name: Tax Cut
concept: Lower taxes put money in citizens’ pockets but shrink short-term revenue.

name: Trade Deal
concept: Opening trade routes quickly boosts exports and treasury funds.

name: Inflation Spike
concept: Runaway prices shake public confidence in leadership.

name: Green Energy
concept: Clean energy jobs grow the economy and keep citizens optimistic.

name: Health Program
concept: Healthcare spending keeps your population resilient.

name: Technology Boom
concept: Innovation hubs create both wealth and excitement.

name: Recession
concept: Short-term pain everywhere, but reforms impress your citizens.

name: Tourism Boost
concept: Festivals and campaigns attract visitors and smiles.

name: Price Controls
concept: Capping prices can slow rivals’ production.

name: Natural Disaster
concept: You allocate relief quickly, but rivals take the political hit.

name: Education Reform
concept: Schools and training grow workers’ skills and optimism.

name: Strike
concept: Labor actions can freeze a rival’s output.

name: Happiness Festival
concept: Celebrate culture to calm citizens and lift morale.
